Songspace | REMOTE | Full time

We're looking for talented and highly motivated software engineers to help make the music business more efficient and transparent for artists and music teams. Songspace is building content and data management tools to power the next phase of the music industry. One part creative app for songwriters & artists (think Evernote) and one part content management system / API for labels and publishers, we utilize the creative process to aggregate assets and data (recordings, lyrics, and copyright ownership details, and music metadata) for artists and music teams.

We're hiring for the following positions:

- Senior Ember.JS Developer

For more information visit http://jobs.emberjs.com/jobs/88358-senior-ember-js-developer... or email chris@songspace.com
